title: Hour 1: NFL Week 1 Recap
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. Smith, Michael Irvin, and Dan Orlovsky recap a wild NFL Week 1, including reaction to the Cowboys losing both the game and their QB Sunday night. Aaron Rodgers and his Packers struggled against the Vikings, but who's to blame for their poor showing? Stephen A. and Irvin disagree on this one. The crew reacts to Mahomes' stellar start to the season against the Cardinals. Plus, the Patriots, 49ers, and Panthers took home Ls on Sunday, but is it just Week 1 or just weak? After a dramatic OT win against the Bengals, we debate if there's reason for optimism in Pittsburgh.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Which teams were Week 1 winners and which were just weak?
